desc.zh:
1985年博覽線開通，溫哥華skytrain系統正式開始營運.
目前此系統擁有3條skytrain,1條海上巴士,1條快鐵路線以及7條快速巴士
desc.en:
Vancouver's light rail system officially began operations in 1985 with the opening of the Expo Line.
Currently, the system includes three SkyTrain lines, one SeaBus, one express rail line, and seven express buses.
